name: FileSystem
description: Input used for reading data from files stored in a Hadoop-compatible monitored filesystem directory (that is: HDFS, S3, NFS, etc.)

properties.tooltip: Directory path to be monitored (HDFS, S3, Azure, etc).If the directory is located in the HDFS used in the tenant configuration one can specify the path omitting the connection details.
Name assigned to the output field generated
Comma-separated list of file names to be excluded
